doc:
Buddy Baer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buddy_Baer 0 Jacob Henry "Buddy" Baer (June 11, 1915 – July 18, 1986) was an American boxer and later an actor in films and on television. In 2003, Baer was chosen for the Ring Magazine's list of 100 greatest punchers of all time. He was the younger brother of boxing heavyweight champion Max Baer, and the uncle of actor Max Baer, Jr. Buddy Baer, like his brother and nephew, also pursued acting. Jacob_Henry_"_Buddy_"_Baer ( June_11_,_1915 – July_18_,_1986 ) was an_American_boxer and later an_actor in films and on television . In 2003 , Baer was_chosen for the_Ring_Magazine 's_list of 100_greatest_punchers of all_time . He was the_younger_brother of boxing_heavyweight_champion_Max_Baer , and the_uncle of actor_Max_Baer , Jr . Buddy_Baer , like his_brother_and_nephew , also pursued_acting .
